title: Cobalt-Themed Résumés and Cover Letters
text: goal cobaltResume create professionally-looking résumés cover letters.

title: Cobalt-Themed Résumés and Cover Letters
text: can install development version cobaltResume GitHub load session :

title: Cobalt-Themed Résumés and Cover Letters
text: Résumés can constructed first creating R Markdown file cobaltResume template. Creating résumé cobaltResume template. resulting .Rmd file, résumé can completed using three features. First, information related identification skills can included résumé filling appropriate YAML header variables shown . Second, sections can created .Rmd file accessorized fontawesome icons (full list, see fontawesome icons). example, \faSuitcase\ Employment results header shown . Creating résumé cobaltResume template. Third, résumé entries can completed using create_resume_entry(). Two examples provided . Note LaTeX code can inserted rendered. two examples produce following two entries resulting PDF file: Creating résumé cobaltResume template. Creating résumé cobaltResume template.
code: firstName: "firstName" lastName: "lastName" position: "Position" #job position being applied to  date: "date"  output:    pdf_document:     template: "cobaltResume.tex" #template file (do not change) #hyperlinks (delete or leave blank blank if not necessary/do not exist) #escape any special characters with two backslashes (for example, see email variable) githubLink: "github.com/user" #link to GitHub githubName: "githubHandle" #GitHub username personalWebsite: "personalwebsite.com" linkedinName: "firstName lastName" linkedinLink: "linkedin.com/in/personal_link" email: "email\\@domain.com"  #skills + citizenship skills: "R, SQL, Python, LaTeX, Bash, HTML, JavaScript, CSS, Machine learning, Data science, Data visualization, Knowledge translation" #skills relevant to the job citizenship: "Citizenship status" #e.g., work permit/study permit/Permanent resident/citizen, etc. create_resume_entry(title = "PhD, Industrial-Organizational Psychology",                   subtitle = "University of Guelph",                   date = "Sep. 2018--May 2023",                   first_point = "Thesis title: \\textbf{Is Timing Everything? The Effects of Measurement Timing on the \\newline Performance of Nonlinear Longitudinal Models}",                   second_point = "Conducted Monte Carlo simulation experiments using R on an Amazon Web Services (AWS) instance to evaluate the performance of structured latent growth curve models under several conditions",                   third_point = "My thesis can be viewed  \\href{\\detokenize{https://atrium.lib.uoguelph.ca/xmlui/bitstream/handle/10214/27543/Sciarra_Sebastian_202304_PhD.pdf?sequence=1&isAllowed=y}}{\\textcolor{blue}{here}}")  create_resume_entry(title = "\\href{sebastiansciarra.com}{sebastiansciarra.com}*", subtitle = "Personal website", date = "Mar. 2023",                   first_point = "Used HTML, JavaScript, and CSS to create a personal website for writing blog posts",                  second_point = 'Blog posts focus on statistics, machine learning, and coding by explaining technical details, providing demonstrations, and conducting simulation experiments',                   third_point = 'Blog posts use code from a variety of language to explain content. As an example, my post titled ``\\href{https://sebastiansciarra.com/coding_tricks/em_demo/}{\\textcolor{blue}{Coding and Visualizing the Expectation-Maximization Algorithm}}" used R, Python, and CSS code')

title: Generates résumé entries. — create_resume_entry
code: create_resume_entry(   title,   subtitle = "",   date,   first_point = "",   second_point = "",   third_point = "",   fourth_point = "" )

title: Generates résumé entries. — create_resume_entry
text: title Title résumé entry. subtitle Additional information related title. date Date achievement/completion period time. first_point First point (necessary) second_point Second point (necessary) third_point Third point (necessary) fourth_point Fourth point (necessary)

title: Generates résumé entries. — create_resume_entry
code: generate_resume_entry(title = "PhD, Industrial-Organizational Psychology", subtitle = "University of Guelph", date = "Sep. 2018--May 2023", first_point = "Thesis title: \\textbf{Is Timing Everything? The Effects of Measurement Timing on the \\newline Performance of Nonlinear Longitudinal Models}", second_point = "Conducted Monte Carlo simulation experiments using R on an Amazon Web Services (AWS) instance to evaluate the performance of structured latent growth curve models under several conditions", third_point = "My thesis can be viewed  \\href{\\detokenize{https://atrium.lib.uoguelph.ca/xmlui/bitstream/handle/10214/27543/Sciarra_Sebastian_202304_PhD.pdf?sequence=1&isAllowed=y}}{\\textcolor{blue}{here}}") #> Error in generate_resume_entry(title = "PhD, Industrial-Organizational Psychology",     subtitle = "University of Guelph", date = "Sep. 2018--May 2023",     first_point = "Thesis title: \\textbf{Is Timing Everything? The Effects of Measurement Timing on the \\newline Performance of Nonlinear Longitudinal Models}",     second_point = "Conducted Monte Carlo simulation experiments using R on an Amazon Web Services (AWS) instance to evaluate the performance of structured latent growth curve models under several conditions",     third_point = "My thesis can be viewed  \\href{\\detokenize{https://atrium.lib.uoguelph.ca/xmlui/bitstream/handle/10214/27543/Sciarra_Sebastian_202304_PhD.pdf?sequence=1&isAllowed=y}}{\\textcolor{blue}{here}}"): could not find function "generate_resume_entry"

title: Generates résumé entries. — generate_resume_entry
code: generate_resume_entry(title = "PhD, Industrial-Organizational Psychology", subtitle = "University of Guelph", date = "Sep. 2018--May 2023", first_point = "Thesis title: \\textbf{Is Timing Everything? The Effects of Measurement Timing on the \\newline Performance of Nonlinear Longitudinal Models}", second_point = "Conducted Monte Carlo simulation experiments using R on an Amazon Web Services (AWS) instance to evaluate the performance of structured latent growth curve models under several conditions", third_point = "My thesis can be viewed  \\href{\\detokenize{https://atrium.lib.uoguelph.ca/xmlui/bitstream/handle/10214/27543/Sciarra_Sebastian_202304_PhD.pdf?sequence=1&isAllowed=y}}{\\textcolor{blue}{here}}") #> \begin{resumeEntry}{PhD, Industrial-Organizational Psychology}{University of Guelph}{Sep. 2018--May 2023}[Thesis title: \textbf{Is Timing Everything? The Effects of Measurement Timing on the \newline Performance of Nonlinear Longitudinal Models}][Conducted Monte Carlo simulation experiments using R on an Amazon Web Services (AWS) instance to evaluate the performance of structured latent growth curve models under several conditions][My thesis can be viewed  \href{\detokenize{https://atrium.lib.uoguelph.ca/xmlui/bitstream/handle/10214/27543/Sciarra_Sebastian_202304_PhD.pdf?sequence=1&isAllowed=y}}{\textcolor{blue}{here}}][]\end{resumeEntry}

what: Merges résumé and cover letter into one PDF file. — merge_resume_cover_letter
title: Merges résumé and cover letter into one PDF file. — merge_resume_cover_letter
text: Function can used overwrite knitr::knit() using knit: cobaltResume::merge_resume_cover_letter YAML header.
